mapper.select: select user_id,user_name as userName,phone_number as phoneNumber,password from t_app_user where phone_number = #{phoneNumber} and user_name = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into t_app_user( user_id, phonenumber, user_name, password, login_time, create_time )values( #{userId}, #{phonenumber}, #{userName}, #{password}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
